Lyrics: Lanquan li jorn son lonc e may
Poetic Translation: In May, long daylight warms the air.

Lyrics: M'es belhs dous chans d'auzelhs de lonh,
Poetic Translation: I hear birds in song far away.

Lyrics: E quan mi suy partitz de lay,
Direct Translation: See Leonardo Malcovati's work at Trobar.org.
Poetic Translation: But when I go and leave them there,

Lyrics: Remembra'm d'un' amor de lonh.
Poetic Translation: I remember love far away.

Lyrics: Vau de talan embroncx e clis
Poetic Translation: I frown and hang my head, dull-eyed;

Lyrics: Si que chans ni flors d'albespis
Poetic Translation: No songs or blossoms can provide

Lyrics: No-m valon plus que l'yverns gelatz.
Poetic Translation: An improvement on winter's freeze.

Lyrics: Be tenc lo Senhor per veray
Poetic Translation: I trust that God is jist amd faor.

Lyrics: Per que formet sest' amor de lonh,
Poetic Translation: Giving me this love far away;

Lyrics: Mas per un ben que m'en eschay
Poetic Translation: But for each pleasure I must bear

Lyrics: N'ai dos mals, quar tant suy de lonh.
Poetic Translation: Double ills, for I'm far away.

Lyrics: A! quar no fuy lai pelegris,
Poetic Translation: Ah! As a pilgrim why not ride

Lyrics: Si que mos fustz e mos tapis
Poetic Translation: Where cloak and staff might be espied

Lyrics: Fos pels sieus belhs huelhs remiratz!
Poetic Translation: By her lovely eyes, overseas?

Lyrics: Be'm parra joys quan li querray,
Poetic Translation: What joy if she will hear my prayer

Lyrics: Per amor Dieu, l'ostal de lonh,
Poetic Translation: And will welcome from far away

Lyrics: E, s'a lieys platz, alberguarai
Poetic Translation: A pilgrim she might lodge somewhere

Lyrics: Pres de lieys, si be'm suy de lonh,
Poetic Translation: Either near her or far away.

Lyrics: Qu'aissi es lo parlamens fis
Poetic Translation: In conversation occupied,

Lyrics: Quan drutz lonhdas et tan vezis
Poetic Translation: A pleasure, being by her side,

Lyrics: Qu'ab cortes ginh jauzis solatz.
Poetic Translation: And a welcome there: Gifts are these!

Lyrics: Iratz e dolens m'en partray,
Poetic Translation: I'll leave that land in pained despair

Lyrics: S'ieu no vey sest' amor de lonh.
Poetic Translation: If I'm kept from love fair away.

Lyrics: No'm sai quora mais la veyrai,
Poetic Translation: Who knows if time we'll ever share

Lyrics: que tan son nostras terras lonh.
Poetic Translation: Since her land is so far away.

Lyrics: Assatz hi a pas e camis,
Poetic Translation: I've many roads and crossings tried

Lyrics: e per aisso no'n suy devis.
Poetic Translation: And still don't know and could not guide;

Lyrics: Mas tot sia cum a lieys platz.
Poetic Translation: But as she prefers may it be.

Lyrics: Jamai d'amor no'm jauziray
Poetic Translation: No other love will I declare

Lyrics: Si no'm jau d'est' amor de lonh,
Poetic Translation: If I can't have love far away;

Lyrics: que mielher ni gensor no'n sai
Poetic Translation: No love exists, not anywhere,

Lyrics: ves nulha part, ni pres ni lonh.
Poetic Translation: That can best my love far away.

Lyrics: Tant es sos pretz ricx e sobris
Poetic Translation: Her sovereign worth be magnified!

Lyrics: Que lai el reng dels Sarrasis
Poetic Translation: Her slave, I wish I could reside

Lyrics: fos hieu per lieys chaitius clamatz.
Poetic Translation: In that southern land on my knees.

Lyrics: Dieus que fetz tot quant ve ni vay
Poetic Translation: O God, who all things made with care

Lyrics: E formet sest'amor de lonh
Poetic Translation: And who shaped this love far away,

Lyrics: Mi don poder, que cor be n'ai,
Poetic Translation: Give strength, for I already dare:

Lyrics: Qu'ieu veya sest'amor de lonh,
Poetic Translation: Let me see my love far away,

Lyrics: Verayamen en luec aizis,
Poetic Translation: So real, so true, so glorified,

Lyrics: Si que las cambras e'l jardis
Poetic Translation: The humble rooms where I abide

Lyrics: Mi resemblo novels palatz.
Poetic Translation: Will a palace seem, filled with ease.

Lyrics: Ver ditz qui m'apella lechay
Poetic Translation: I won't deny it; I'm aware

Lyrics: e deziros d'amor de lonh,
Poetic Translation: That I grasp for love far away:

Lyrics: que nulhs autres joys tan no'm play
Poetic Translation: No other pleasure can compare

Lyrics: Cum jauzimen d'amor de lonh.
Poetic Translation: To the joy of love far away.

Lyrics: Mas so qu'ieu vuelh m'es tant ahis,
Poetic Translation: But all I long for is denied

Lyrics: Qu'enaissi'm fadet mos pairis
Poetic Translation: For my godfather keeps me tied

Lyrics: Qu'ieu ames e nos fos amatz.
Poetic Translation: Where I love unloved through my pleas.

Lyrics: Jaufre Rudel
Poetic Translation: Carol Anne Perry Lagemann
